<h3 id="X22515">X(22515) = PARALLELOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: EHRMANN-MID TO 1st ANTI-BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^8-3*(b^2+c^2)*a^6+(b^4+4*b^2*c^2+c^4)*a^4+(2*b^2-c^2)*(b^2-2*c^2)*(b^2+c^2)*a^2-(2*b^4-3*b^2*c^2+2*c^4)*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(22515) = 3*X(2)-4*X(15092) = 3*X(3)-5*X(14061) = X(3)-3*X(14639) = 5*X(4)-X(147) = 3*X(4)+X(148) = 3*X(4)-X(6033) = 11*X(4)-X(14692) = 3*X(147)+5*X(148) = 3*X(147)-5*X(6033) = X(147)+5*X(6321) = 11*X(147)-5*X(14692) = 2*X(147)-5*X(22505) = X(148)-3*X(6321) = 11*X(148)+3*X(14692) = 2*X(148)+3*X(22505) = X(6033)+3*X(6321) = 11*X(6033)-3*X(14692) = 2*X(6033)-3*X(22505) = 11*X(6321)+X(14692) = 2*X(6321)+X(22505) = 3*X(10723)+5*X(14061) = X(10723)+3*X(14639) = 5*X(14061)-9*X(14639)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal parallelogic center of these triangles is X(385).</p>
<p>X(22515) lies on these lines:
{2,15092}, {3,10723}, {4,147}, {5,620}, {30,115}, {76,18547}, {98,382}, {99,381}, {114,546}, {542,1539}, {543,3845}, {549,6722}, {550,6036}, {671,3830}, {690,10113}, {1478,13183}, {1479,13182}, {1656,21166}, {2023,7748}, {2482,5066}, {2777,15535}, {2783,22799}, {2787,22938}, {2794,3627}, {2799,19163}, {3023,3583}, {3027,3585}, {3044,10540}, {3091,13172}, {3146,14651}, {3534,9166}, {3543,9862}, {3818,5969}, {3839,8724}, {3843,13188}, {3850,10992}, {3857,20399}, {3860,15300}, {3861,14981}, {4027,14042}, {5026,19130}, {5055,12117}, {5461,8703}, {5939,9993}, {6054,12355}, {6319,18509}, {6320,18511}, {7747,12829}, {7845,13449}, {7951,15452}, {7983,18525}, {8782,18500}, {8997,18538}, {9167,10109}, {9818,13175}, {9955,11711}, {9996,11185}, {10053,12953}, {10069,12943}, {10086,10895}, {10089,10896}, {10733,18332}, {10742,10769}, {10754,18440}, {11801,15357}, {12041,15359}, {12100,14971}, {12295,16278}, {12699,13178}, {12902,15342}, {13173,18491}, {13174,18492}, {13176,18495}, {13177,18497}, {13179,18507}, {13180,18516}, {13181,18517}, {13184,18520}, {13185,18522}, {13189,18542}, {13190,18544}, {13665,19109}, {13785,19108}, {13989,18762}, {14830,15682}, {15704,20398}, {18761,22514}</p>
<p>
X(22515) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 10723}, {4, 6321}, {98, 382}, {671, 3830}, {3543, 11632}, {6054, 12355}, {7983, 18525}, {10733, 18332}, {10742, 10769}, {10754, 18440}, {12295, 16278}, {12699, 13178}, {12902, 15342}, {13179, 18507}, {14830, 15682}<br>
X(22515) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (114, 546), (550, 6036), (2482, 5066), (5026, 19130), (12041, 15359)<br>
X(22515) = complement of X(38730)<br>
X(22515) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 148, 6033), (671, 10722, 12188), (3091, 13172, 15561), (3830, 12188, 10722), (6033, 6321, 148), (10723, 14639, 3), (12355, 14269, 6054)<br>
</p>
